Package org.blockchainnative.builder

Class ParameterInfoBuilder<TSelf extends ParameterInfoBuilder<TSelf,TParameterInfo,TMethodInfoBuilder>,TParameterInfo extends ParameterInfo,TMethodInfoBuilder extends MethodInfoBuilder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.blockchainnative.builder.ParameterInfoBuilder<TSelf,TParameterInfo,TMethodInfoBuilder>
  • Type Parameters:
    TSelf - Concrete type of the ParameterInfoBuilder
    TParameterInfo - Concrete type of the ParameterInfo to be created
    TMethodInfoBuilder - Concrete type of the MethodInfoBuilder used by this builder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EthereumContractInfoBuilder.EthereumParameterInfoBuilder, FabricContractInfoBuilder.FabricParameterInfoBuilder
    public abstract class ParameterInfoBuilder<TSelf extends ParameterInfoBuilder<TSelf,TParameterInfo,TMethodInfoBuilder>,TParameterInfo extends ParameterInfo,TMethodInfoBuilder extends MethodInfoBuilder>
extends java.lang.Object
    Fluent API to build ParameterInfo objects.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    ContractInfo, ParameterInfo, MethodInfoBuilder, ParameterInfoBuilder, EventInfoBuilder, EventParameterInfoBuilder, EventFieldInfoBuilder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ParameterInfoBuilder​(TMethodInfoBuilder methodInfoBuilder, java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter)
      Initializes a new ParameterInfoBuilder for the given parameter and assigns the values from the metadata annotation ContractParameter and SpecialArgument

      TMethodInfoBuilder build()
      Creates the ParameterInfo object declared through the fluent API.
      protected abstract TParameterInfo buildInternal()
      Creates the concrete ParameterInfo represented by the builder.

      Returns the ParameterInfo object declared through the fluent API.

      Returns if the ParameterInfo object represented by the builder has already been built or not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParameterInfoBuilder

        public ParameterInfoBuilder​(TMethodInfoBuilder methodInfoBuilder,
                            java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter)
        Initializes a new ParameterInfoBuilder for the given parameter and assigns the values from the metadata annotation ContractParameter and SpecialArgument
        Parameters:
        methodInfoBuilder - parent builder
        parameter - smart contract method parameter

    • Method Detail

      • useTypeConverter

        public TSelf useTypeConverter​(java.lang.Class<? extends TypeConverter<?,?>> typeConverterClass)
        Sets the TypeConverter to be used to convert the parameter value before passing it to underlying provider.
        Initial value is taken from ContractParameter.useTypeConverter()
        Parameters:
        typeConverterClass - class of the TypeConverter to be used to convert the parameter
        Returns:
        this ParameterInfoBuilder

      • passParameterAsType

        public TSelf passParameterAsType​(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Sets the Type the parameter value should be converted to before passing it to underlying provider.
        Initial value is taken from ContractParameter.asType()

        Due to type erasure you need to use a specific type converter in order to convert to a generic type

        Parameters:
        type - type the parameter value should be converted to.
        Returns:
        this ParameterInfoBuilder

      • passAsSpecialArgWithName

        public TSelf passAsSpecialArgWithName​(java.lang.String name)
        Controls whether or not the parameter targeted by this ParameterInfo is marked as special argument to the underlying provider.
        How this parameter is interpreted is up to provider.
        Initial value is taken from SpecialArgument.value()
        Parameters:
        name - name of the special argument or null if the parameter should not be treated as special argument
        Returns:
        this ParameterInfoBuilder

      • isSpecialArgument

        public boolean isSpecialArgument()
        Returns whether the parameter targeted by this ParameterInfo is declared as special argument.
        That is when the special argument name is not null or empty.
        Returns:
        flag indicating whether or not the parameter targeted by this MethodInfo is marked as special method

      • self

        protected TSelf self()
        Returns itself as the generic parameter TSelf.
        Allows sub types of ParameterInfoBuilder to return the correct type from the fluent methods like useTypeConverter(Class).
        Returns:
        this casted to TSelf

      • hasBeenBuilt

        public boolean hasBeenBuilt()
        Returns if the ParameterInfo object represented by the builder has already been built or not.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the ParameterInfo object represented by the builder has already been built or not

      • getParameterInfo

        public TParameterInfo getParameterInfo()
        Returns the ParameterInfo object declared through the fluent API.
        Must only be called after build().
        Returns:
        ParameterInfo object represented by the builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case the build() has not been called before.

      • build

        public final TMethodInfoBuilder build()
        Creates the ParameterInfo object declared through the fluent API.
        Must only be called once.
        Returns:
        ParameterInfo object represented by the builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case the build() has been called before.

      • buildInternal

        protected abstract TParameterInfo buildInternal()
        Creates the concrete ParameterInfo represented by the builder.
        Returns:
        ParameterInfo represented by the builder
